about_the_game:
Ah, the Amazon Rainforest, a land of great biological diversity, yet once again at risk. This time, these workers intend to destroy it to build a simple paper clip factory.

However, the forest animals are not standing idly by and will face them.

You are an native from the region and will be in charge of strategically positioning the animals using the terrain available and the collectibles in the levels to finally expel these invaders in this reimagining of the classic chess game.

Defeat the workers through several stages with multiple obstacles

3 stages available to play in solo mode in this demo.

Use the collectible power-ups on the field to dominate the match

Randomly defined unique powers that can help or hinder your performance, all depending on your skill.

Controls:

Tap the piece of your choice and place it on one of the possible spaces on the board, your objective is to eliminate the king of the opponent's field (Blue Macaw on the animals and foreman on the workers' side). Move your camera with keyboard arrows or moving your mouse to screen edges.

Show these workers why they shouldn't mess with nature!
